The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please be aware that the first day of the new academic year on Monday 19th August will be an 'Orientation Day' & ‘Meet the Teacher’ Event.
New Families Only:
We would like to formally invite new BSG students and parents to join us from 10:00am-12:00pm. You will be able to join your child in their new class and spend some time getting to know the teacher.
Existing BSG Families:
Existing parents are then invited to join us from 12:00pm for light refreshments in the Reception area. This will be an opportunity to meet and welcome the new families to BSG.
At 1:00pm there will be a short presentation in the Hall in which Lower School specific information will be given. At 1:30pm parents will be invited to their child’s class where you will meet their new teacher and teaching assistants who will provide you with information specific to your child’s class to help make your child’s transition as smooth as possible.
There will be no lessons for children on this day, however, children are welcome to come along to the ‘Orientation’ morning (new children only) and Meet the Teacher event. There will be supervision provided in the new activity room for those children who would like to play with their friends whilst parents are meeting the teachers.
Uniform:
Please note that the uniform shop, which is situated at the Nanhu Upper School, will be open from Monday 12th August.
All students will come to school as normal, with a full bus service being provided, from Tuesday the 20th August.
We look forward to seeing you and hope you have had a relaxing summer holiday.
Warm Regards,
Miss Kathy Head of Lower School The British School of Guangzhou
